sqlMap.insert: insert into ST_INDUSTRY_HOT ( TRADE_DATE, RANK, INDUSTRY_NAME, CHANGE_PCT, TOT_MARKET_CAP, TURNOVER_RATE, RISE_STOCKS_NUM, FALL_STOCKS_NUM, RISE_LEAD_STOCK_NAME, RISE_LEAD_STOCK_CHANGE_PCT, TIMESTAMP, SOURCE, AVG_PRICE) values ( #tradeDate#, #rank#, #industryName#, #changePercent#, #totalMarketCap#, #turnoverRate#, #riseStocksNum#, #fallStocksNum#, #riseLeadStockName#, #riseLeadStockChangePercent#, #timestamp#, #source#, #avgPrice# )
sqlMap.delete: delete from ST_INDUSTRY_HOT where LEFT(TRADE_DATE, 10)=#tradeDateStr# AND SOURCE = #source#
sqlMap.select: select * from ST_INDUSTRY_HOT where TRADE_DATE = #tradeDate# ORDER BY RANK

select a.*, b.INDUSTRY_URL, b.CORPS_NUM from ST_INDUSTRY_HOT a, ST_INDUSTRY_INFO b where a.INDUSTRY_NAME = b.INDUSTRY_NAME AND a.TRADE_DATE like CONCAT(#tradeDateStr# , '%') AND a.SOURCE = #source# AND a.SOURCE = b.SOURCE ORDER BY a.RANK

SELECT TRADE_DATE, RANK, INDUSTRY_NAME, CHANGE_PCT, RISE_LEAD_STOCK_NAME, RISE_LEAD_STOCK_CHANGE_PCT, TIMESTAMP FROM ST_INDUSTRY_HOT WHERE (RANK <= 80 OR RANK > 120) AND TRADE_DATE >= #lowTradeDateStr# AND TRADE_DATE <= #highTradeDateStr# AND SOURCE='THS' ORDER BY LEFT(TRADE_DATE, 10), RANK
select * from ST_INDUSTRY_HOT where TRADE_DATE like CONCAT(#tradeDateStr# , '%') AND SOURCE = #source# ORDER BY RANK
SELECT * FROM ST_INDUSTRY_HOT WHERE TRADE_DATE >= #lowTradeDateStr# AND TRADE_DATE <= #highTradeDateStr# AND SOURCE = #source# ORDER BY TRADE_DATE, RANK
